# 1. Setting up the age vector

# 9. Printing integers between 1 and 100 that are not divisible by 3, 5, or 7
Filter(function(i) { all(i %% c(3, 5, 7) != 0) }, seq(100))
# Output:
# [1] 1 2 4 8 11 13 16 17 19 23 29 31 32 34 37 41 43 47 49 53 59 61 62 64 67 71 73 74 76 79 83 89 91 97

# 10. Sequence backwards from 1 to 100
seq(100, 1)
# Output:
# [1] 100 99 98 97 96 ... 2 1

# 11. Multiples of 3 or 5 below 25 and their sum
multiples <- Filter(function(x) x %% 3 == 0 | x %% 5 == 0, seq(24))
sum(multiples)
# Output:
# [1] 78

# 14. Changing NA values to 999
a <- c(1, 2, NA, 4, NA, 6, 7)
print(a, na.print="-999")
# Output:
# [1] 1 2 -999 4 -999 6 7

# 15. Output of name and age prompt
name = readline(prompt="Input your name: ")
age = readline(prompt="Input your age: ")
